metadata.title: CVE-2023-31082 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in drivers/tty/n_gsm.c in the Linux kernel 6.2.There is a sleeping function called from an invalid context in gsmld_write,which will block the kernel.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needs-triage').
